title: ISic020291. ISic020291
body:
Facsimile Images

ΕΛ̣ΥΜΩΙ

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

This is the only inscription in the Elymian corpus that is surely identifiable as Greek. From the shape of the letters the inscription can be dated, according to Agostiniani, to a time not earlier than the Hellenistic period. Doubts about the authenticity of the inscription have been raised legitimately by Manni Piraino (1972).

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 1977 291 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002201
  • Manni Piraino 1972-1973 344-345 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001773
  • Ambrosini 1970 465, 466 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002187
  • Tusa 1970 no.128 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002567
